import "../styles/Board.css"; import React from 'react'; // Import React import scarlet from "../images/scarlet.PNG"; // Import the image URL export default function Board() { function getPosition(event){ // Get the x and y coordinates of the click relative to the container const x = event.nativeEvent.offsetX; const y = event.nativeEvent.offsetY; // Log or use the x and y coordinates as needed alert(`X: ${x}, Y: ${y}`); } function initializedCharacters() { const locations = { study: [[75, 160], [82, 118]], hall: [[80, 460], [50, 252]], lounge: [[621, 683], [44, 210]], library: [[76, 175], [284, 339]], billiard: [[77, 140], [441, 509]], dinning: [[57, 181], [316, 490]], conservatory: [[40, 197], [610, 770]], ballroom: [[323, 444], [606, 676]], kitchen: [[636, 709], [631, 695]] }; const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * Object.keys(locations).length); // Generate a random index const randomRoom = Object.keys(locations)[randomIndex]; // Get a random room name // Generate random x and y coordinates within the range of the selected room const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * (locations[randomRoom][0][1] - locations[randomRoom][0][0]) + locations[randomRoom][0][0]); const y = Math.floor(Math.random() * (locations[randomRoom][1][1] - locations[randomRoom][1][0]) + locations[randomRoom][1][0]); // Return the JSX for the initialized character image return ( ); } return (
{initializedCharacters()} {/* Call initializedCharacters function */}
Scarlet
Green
White
Plum
Mustard
Peacock
{/* Repeat the same structure for other suspects */}
); }
